content: Signaling systems transmit information within cells, between cells, between organs, between entire organisms, between populations of organisms, and even between different species in entire ecosystems.
translations: ita:I sistemi di segnalazione trasmettono informazioni all'interno delle cellule, tra cellule, tra organi, tra organismi int
